data.value: Visually Hides content while still keeping it accessible for screen readers.
Set the value of 'box-sizing' to 'border-box', so that the element's padding and border are included in its width.
Prevents the container of a floated element from collapsing.
Applies a solid, 1px wide border to the element. A border color class can then be used to set a color for the border.
Sets a variety of baseline styles for the element. This helper applies 'border-box' box sizing, removes any margins and padding, and removes box shadow.
